OCC: Hello Teltoli!!!!!!It's nice to see you here!!!!!

Windlord/Termitron::

The sharped eyes of Windlord saw the pod fall, and he screamed "A 
pod!!!"

And with out other comment he flew towards the pod quikly as he could.

Termitron saw all and went where Aerotur was and asked him "What's 
happen here?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Steph Teltoli <steph_teltoli@m...> wrote:
> Hiya everyone! I would say I'm new here, but I'm not exactly, I've 
bene here
> before, some of you might remember me.. I hope. LOL Umm anyway, I'm 
just
> saying Hi! to Zardus and Airshadow Nightlight!! *waves madly*.
> 
> Also, could someone, like, find me? LOL I don't exactly wanna start 
out an
> RPG with no-one to RPG -with-. :D
> 
> I'll attach my profile down the bottom.. *_*
> 
> ~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~
> 
> The gentle silence of the night was broken sharply by the sound of 
a Status
> Pod suddenly zipping through the sky and crash landing on the soft 
Earth.
> Birds squawked and flew off, startled, and flapped their way to a 
possibly
> more peaceful area.
> 
> The moonlight reflected off the polished metal, only marred by a 
slight dirt
> scrape. The DNA scanner opened the panel and slid upwards, sending 
out an
> electronic wave.
> 
> ::DNA found:: It reported, and slid back into the Pod. It clicked 
and
> whirred for a few minutes, then the lid cracked open with a hiss. A 
shadow
> climbed out, it's movements cautious.
> 
> What little light there was showed a dark black panther, with 
silver/black
> wings attached to it's shoulder blades. Her emerald green eyes 
glittered in
> the low light, and she darted a few quick looks around her to make 
sure she
> wasn't going to be attack or anything like that.
> 
> A glimmer of light caught her Maximal mark, but she found herself 
wondering
> why she was with the Maximals. The last time she was here, they had 
bene led
> by Liono Prime. The bot smirked a little, and sat down in her 
Panther/Hawk
> mode, waiting a little before she could travel.
> 
> ~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~
> 
> Name: Teltoli SilverWing
> 
> Gender: Female
> 
> Beast Mode Characteristics: As a Panther/Hawk Fuzor, Teltoli has 
the body of
> a panther, with silver `socks' on her four paws. Her eyes are 
emerald green.
> From her shoulder blades are two large wings, also black with 
silver marks.
> 
> Bot Mode Characteristics: In her Bot mode, Teltoli is also black 
with green
> eyes, and silver on her arms that look like elbow-length gloves, 
and silver
> ringlets on her ankles. She is very pretty, in a girlish sort of 
way. Her
> faded gray Maximal mark is on the outside top of her right leg. Her 
face is
> faintly cat-tish, with the two rounded ears on top of her head, and 
faint
> whisker marks. Her black wings also stay on her back in Bot Mode, 
so she can
> fly.
> 
> Weapons: The panther tail turns into a whip with a long scythe-like 
blade at
> the end. From her wings, come two long rapiers that she can use 
with deadly
> accuracy.
> 
> Personality: Teltoli is a kind, caring Bot, easy to love and be 
loved with
> all her heart, and acts a lot like a small child in the way of 
innocence.
> But sometimes that gets her in trouble when she's in battle. 
However, once
> she is fired up for a fight, she will go down to the end for her 
friends and
> leader.
> Her father was a great warrior, and taught her many of his moves, 
and her
> mother taught her others things, like healing with herbs when one 
was
> running low on power.
> 
> ------------------
> Teltoli SilverWing
> Panther/Hawk Fuzor
>
